item.title: SQuARE: Sequential Question Answering Reasoning Engine for Enhanced Chain-of-Thought in Large Language Models
item.description: SQUARE, a novel prompting technique, enhances LLM reasoning by prompting self-interrogation through sequential question answering, significantly outperforming traditional methods.

item.title: Low-Rank Adapters Meet Neural Architecture Search for LLM Compression
item.description: Low-rank adapters combined with neural architecture search revolutionize LLM compression, enabling efficient fine-tuning and significantly reduced memory footprint.

item.title: Safeguard Fine-Tuned LLMs Through Pre- and Post-Tuning Model Merging
item.description: Boost fine-tuned LLMs’ performance without sacrificing safety by merging pre- and post-tuning model weights!
